trans-unit.source: A collection of objects that inherit the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 繼承 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> 抽象類別的物件之集合。

trans-unit.source: The membership providers for an application are exposed as a read-only <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProviderCollection> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.Providers%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership> class.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的成員資格提供者會公開為唯讀<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProviderCollection>由<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.Providers%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership>類別。

trans-unit.source: You can access a specific membership provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以依名稱存取集合中特定的成員資格提供者，並將其轉型為特定的提供者型別，例如<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to manage membership information from multiple data stores in a single application as well as access custom members of a membership provider that are not part of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您從單一應用程式中的多個資料存放區管理成員資格資訊，以及存取的成員資格提供者的自訂成員不屬於<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980) before continuing.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不熟悉的 ASP.NET 成員資格功能，請參閱[成員資格簡介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980)才能繼續。

trans-unit.source: For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd).
trans-unit.target: 如需與成員資格相關的其他主題的清單，請參閱[使用成員資格管理使用者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists the providers enabled for an application and their respective types.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會列出啟用應用程式和其各自的型別提供者。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new, empty membership provider collection.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的空白成員資格提供者集合。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式不是從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: The membership provider to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入集合的成員資格提供者。

trans-unit.source: Adds a membership provider to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將成員資格提供者加入集合。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法並不適合從程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="provider" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="provider" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="provider" /> is not of a type that inherits the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="provider" /> 不是繼承 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> 抽象類別的類型。

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProviderCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 一維陣列，是從 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProviderCollection" /> 複製項目之目的端。

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 陣列必須有以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: <c>array</c> 中以零起始的索引，複製作業從此處開始。

trans-unit.source: Copies the membership provider collection to a one-dimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 將成員資格提供者集合複製到一維陣列。

trans-unit.source: This method uses <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to copy role provider objects to the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>角色提供者物件複製到指定的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProviderCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the contents of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProviderCollection> to an array of <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProviderCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法，將複製的內容<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProviderCollection>陣列<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The number of elements in the source array is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 來源陣列中的元素數目，大於從 <paramref name="index" /> 到目的 <paramref name="array" /> 末端的可用空間。

trans-unit.source: The type of the source array cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 來源陣列的型別不能自動轉換成目的端 <paramref name="array" /> 的型別。

trans-unit.source: The name of the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 成員資格提供者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the membership provider in the collection referenced by the specified provider name.
trans-unit.target: 在指定提供者名稱參考的集合中，取得成員資格提供者。

trans-unit.source: An object that inherits the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 繼承 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> 抽象類別的物件。

trans-unit.source: The membership providers for an application are exposed as a read-only <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProviderCollection> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.Providers%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership> class.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的成員資格提供者會公開為唯讀<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProviderCollection>由<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.Providers%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership>類別。

trans-unit.source: You can access a specific membership provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以依名稱存取集合中特定的成員資格提供者，並將其轉型為特定的提供者型別，例如<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to manage membership information from multiple data stores in a single application as well as access custom members of a membership provider that are not part of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您從單一應用程式中的多個資料存放區管理成員資格資訊，以及存取的成員資格提供者的自訂成員不屬於<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example accesses a <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> configured for an application from the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.Providers%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership> class by name.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例存取<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>設定從應用程式的<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.Providers%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership>類別名稱。
